From: "Dark Mouse" <logomorph@...>

::DarkMouse::

*Yawns and crawls out of her hiding place in the base of a tree in the 
forest.  She stays in Mouse mode and scurries off through the forest. She is 
a little upset over the fact that she can't find place to fit in.*

*She whispers to herself as she goes along.*

"I can't believe it.  I'm a Pred.  I know my programming.  I know I should 
be without mercy and pity for anything.  I know I am supposed to be cold 
hearted and without regret.  So why am I not.  Why do I care? Why should I 
care? I'm a Pred.  I shouldn't care about anyone or anything.  But then why 
do I find myself actually giving a care about what happens around here.  I 
have seen bots destroyed and terminated.  I have killed enemies and fought 
before.  Yet I find myself regretting the killings.  Why is this happening 
to me?"

*She stopped and looked down at her Predacon symbol.  She felt disgust when 
she looked at it.  She had never felt like this before.  She couldn't 
believe that her programming was doing this to her.  She wanted to rip the 
symbol off her body and burn it.  But would the Maximals accpet her knowing 
she was once a Pred?  Would The Pred's kill her for turning traitor?  She 
pondered this as she walked along. She stopped by a large tree stump and 
transformed into bot mode.  She sat on the stump and looked at the Pred 
symbol again. She felt like she would never regain her honor if she tore it 
off.  But she couldn't stand to look at it any more. She sighed very heavily 
and put her hand over the symbol. She ripped it off and threw it to the 
ground.  She stared at it for some time.  She knew she did the right thing.  
But she wondered if doing the right thing would cost her her life.*
